title: Sans Serif, Modern font
author: dannyutah

comments.content: It could be **[Good Times](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162316/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Good%20Times%20-%20Regular&fid=58675f8b3e8d2b86212d965512aff412&fsize=60&text=POWERCO&fit=1)** free font by Ray Larabie [Typodermic, 1998], modified to connect the lines of /P/E/R
looks like it to me. awesome thanks.
